pacman.gameobjects

Class Blinky

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.gameobjects.Ghost
      • pacman.gameobjects.Blinky
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject

    public class Blinky
extends Ghost
    This class is responsible for managing the Blinky-ghosts. Blinky is the ghost that follows and tries to catch pacman when it gets close enough. until then it moves randomly.
    Author:
    eerop
